今天没导，差评

楽しいOW2を心穏やかにプレイするにあたって必須の設定を記載。


初めにタイトルメニューから
ESC→オプション→サウンド→ボイスチャットに入り、
・マッチボイスチャット＞相手チームからお互いの健闘を称える等という高尚な音声が贈られることは皆無なので必須でオフ
・チームボイスチャット＞チームメイトから音声で建設的な提案がある事はほぼ無いのでオフを強く推奨。


続けて、オプション→ソーシャル→テキストチャットに入り、
・マッチテキストチャット＞相手チームからお互いの健闘を称えるチャットは上と同じく皆無。煽りに使われるだけなので必須でオフ
・チームテキストチャット＞極々稀に勝利の為の提案がされることがあるので私はOnにしているが、
9割8分は(アカウント名)noobとか(アカウント名Gap)など役に立たないメッセージが流れるだけなので見たくない方はオフ推奨。


上記4項目を設定してから画面解像度などの設定を詰めてOWの世界に飛びだそう！

[h1]The Story of Hate and Love[/h1]
[b]protagonist #1:[/b]
[list]
    [*]over 3000 hours of Playtime on OW1 / OW2 combined
    [*]Hardcore Fan from the Beginning (2016)
    [*]Sceptical of many decisions but wanted to give every a fair chance to proof diffrently
    [*]BattlePass-Enemy
[/list]
Once upon a time when the games and the monetization were fun, fair and in harmony a greedy king named "Activision" wanted to rule the Gaming world with his greediness and try to empty all the wallets in the world. There was one lord that showed the world he can make great games and treat people fair and with equalness. His name was Blizzard. The world trusted his magicians who created diffrent fantasy worlds full of fun and love. It did not take long, Activision could not satisfy the greed of his secret monster named "Bobby" that was trapped in the upper dungeon of his headquaters swimming in pools of champagne and breastmilk. The people loved and valued Blizzard for the joy he brought to their lifes. It did not take long the monster got too strong. To survive it needed to incorporate more gamer souls and make them suffer as many before them suffered. Blizzard fought strong and defended his lands with honor and glory, but everything was futile. Over the years the moster got too mighty. Blizzard lost the fight and had to give in. But as many legends said: Not all heroes were capes. A close friend of Blizzard who gave his everything to help defend Blizzards lands like it was his own son. Today people still tell stories about that hero named "Jeff". But to protect his family he decided to go a diffrent route. He fought willingly but could not save his friend. That decision might have saved his life legends say. Looking back on the shards of his friend all that was left was his broken heart. That was the last time we heard from him. He might have found a new friend. Meanwhile the monster was still alive. The people got left in the dust with bread crumps for years with no hope in sight.
Months went by and the people lost hope more and more. Weekly false promises and worse desicions of balancing their new lands lead to people looking for new jobs. A new experience was praised from the lords but it was all the curtain of the dark money spell. Food was rare, it was a true dark time for many people. But there was this small hope on the horizon. A new maschine and new ways of earning food. A new maschine was delivered but it did not work how it should. The people slowly realized if they just stop buying the overpromised lands maybe the kingdom Activision would fall apart and could get back to his older days. But the monster controlled the lands with his iron claws.
5 years later it was a cold season, Activision was desperate. People noticed the might of Activision does not look that bad if you just leave the lands and look for alternatives. Demoralized Activision reached out to some far away monks named "Microsoft" and "Valve" to save his lands from the total downfall. But it was too late. Was the monster defeated? Bad stories were told about Activision in the suggestions box of Valves castle door. Till this day only selected legends will understand the full story.

What have we learnd today kids? Yes absolutely correct: Karma will get everbody even monsters and their false kings.

Sincerly your brother - Cas -

People like to complain, but the players who get on here (and take the time to download) just to leave a bad review are probably hopping right back onto BattleNet to continue playing. Overwatch is a great game. Yes, they've definitely gotten a lot more money hungry throughout the last few months, however it's no worse than pretty much any other major free to play multiplayer game. Plus, the old Loot Box system sucked. It wasn't nearly as good as people want to act like it was. They could have gone about Overwatch 2 in a better way and the launch should have been executed more intelligently, but overall they had to make a choice. They chose to give a dying game new life and bring in guaranteed new players for years to come. Before OW2, you'd be waiting upwards of 20 minutes for a match, which really bummed me out because I love the game. Now you wait between 1 and 5. It's still the same great game at it's core. If you only play games to collect cosmetics, it's probably not for you. If you want fun multiplayer, it's absolutely worth a try!

shit game

shit company

Overwatch was my least favorite game of all time, but it was a global phenomenon. Everybody played it, and even I could squeeze some enjoyment out of playing with others. Somehow, Overwatch 2 is much, much worse. An unrewarding, frustrating, toxic experience, featuring lazy content, overpriced *everything*, and a terrible battle pass. The bar was low, and their greed and incompetence didn't let them reach it. They somehow managed to make me miss lootboxes. Don't give this your time, your money, or any space in your mind. Anything else is better.

不推荐新人入坑此款游戏以及暴雪公司的其他任何一款游戏，因为每一个暴雪玩家最后都只会剩下失望。
远到：
SC2编辑器的全部作品版权归暴雪所有；
OW禁止非官方赛事；
“你们都没有手机吗？”“you guys dont have phones？”
WAR3重置版；
炉石佣兵战记；
SC2停止更新；
风暴英雄取消官方联赛；
近有：
战网退出国服；
OW2 PVE模式；
暗黑4 1.1版本更新；
WOW推出乌贼宠物礼包；
暴雪浑身散发着愚蠢的恶臭，通体流着傲慢的血，给多少信任他的玩家喂了一坨又一坨答辩。让玩家玩的开心的每一个设计，最终都会被暴雪改掉。一家彻底站在玩家对立面的游戏公司，拥有一些技术力，但不创造快乐的游戏公司。
玩游戏不就是为了开心吗？

首先，进游戏黑屏，只要再点一次ESC就可以了，然后我要开始喷了！喷暴雪的够多了，我来喷一下那些更该喷的！
     暴雪垃圾，守望好游戏，你要无脑说守望垃圾那就垃圾，那你对，现在暴雪死了，微软才是守望他爹，给差评喷暴雪欢迎，那些喷游戏的？你是nt吗？

     今天的暴雪再狗屎，曾经也是暴雪，但是今天的某迅和某易连狗屎都不如，它们却是一直如此！
     给差评没问题，但是如果你不是曾经198或98购买的，如果你曾经不是买了暴雪重置魔兽的，如果你曾经不是在国服充值很多钱的，如果你连魔兽世界都没玩过，你特么连魔兽争霸是什么都不知道，偶买噶，你凭什么给差评？你凭什么给差评？你凭什么给差评？结果你给某公司手游天天买皮肤，你配吗？你配吗？你配吗？
     如果你再用手机玩这宇宙第一盗版厂腾讯游戏，并且给他充值，你手机还玩着宇宙第一不要脸吃相最难看的网易游戏，并且给他充值，而你没有在暴雪花过一分钱，那么，你给差评，你O+只会悲惨的包B，知道吗？
     甚至你连守望先锋是什么都不知道，你连暴雪是什么都不知道，甚至你下载个steam只为了玩那个lj的永劫无间，你过来给守望先锋一个差评，来搞得自己好像非常高大尚很有品味很有想法，那么你不止会O+包B，你下辈子也会O+包B，知道吗？
     还有，为什么人家暴雪辛辛苦苦做的游戏，到你这给你网易轻轻松松一个代理，就可以分走50%的利润？网易凭什么？就凭你网易不要脸？还有一大堆孝子？
     还有真正祸害中国的，就是某迅和某易，用垃圾游戏弄垄断，打压小厂，有能力做游戏却不去做，因为如果它们做出了好游戏，让那些只会吃屎的人吃到了美食，那他们以后就不吃屎了，那么那是屎就会亏出屎，所以某迅和某易只能通过打压和拒绝制作好游戏，来让某些人只懂得吃屎，这样它们就可以用屎，来赚钱继续去打压小厂~！
